original: “‘idaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
analyzed: idam dukkham ariya saccanti me bhikkhave pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi ālokaḥ udapādi

original: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: tam kho panidam dukkham ariya saccam pariññeyyanti me bhikkhave pe
idam dukkha samudayam ariya saccanti me bhikkhave pe

original: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: tam kho panidam dukkha samudayam ariya saccam pahātabbanti me bhikkhave pe
idam dukkha nirodham ariya saccanti me bhikkhave pe

original: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: tam kho panidam dukkha nirodham ariya saccam sacchikātabbanti me bhikkhave pe
idam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ariya saccanti me bhikkhave pe

original: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: tam kho panidam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ariya saccam bhāvetabbanti me bhikkhave pe

original: bhāvitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
analyzed: bhāvitanti me bhikkhave pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi pe
tena hi dvādasa vatthukam ñāṇam lokuttaranti

original: Mātughātako ānantariko pitughātako ānantariko arahantaghātako ānantariko ruhiruppādako
analyzed: mātu ghātako ānantarikaḥ pitu ghātakaḥ ānantarikaḥ arahanta ghātakaḥ ānantarikaḥ ruhiruppādako

original: ānantariko saṅghabhedako ānantariko, natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇaṁ, natthi nirayesu
analyzed: ānantariko saṅgha bhedako ānantarikaḥ natthi puthujjanassa natthi nirayesu

original: nirayapālā, atthi devesu tiracchānagatā, pañcaṅgiko maggo, dvādasavatthukaṁ ñāṇaṁ lokuttaranti.
analyzed: niraya pālāḥ atthi devesu tiracchāna gatā pañcaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ dvādasa vatthukam ñāṇam lokuttaranti

original: Niggaho, puññasañcayo, aṭṭhāsi, atītena ca mātughātako.
analyzed: niggaho puñña sañcayaḥ aṭṭhāsi atītena ca mātu ghātako
